title: I cannot fully disable Silent Notifications. I have everything set to alert me.
content: I have all apps set to alert me and message apps to show previews, but if I'm using some other apps like my Kindle it will still force Silent Notifications. I'm going completely crazy because I'm missing important messages due to a feature I can't turn off and never asked for.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
